This documentation is for version 2.0.dev, which is not released yet.

Spreadsheets (Spreadsheet)¶

class lingpy.basic.spreadsheet.Spreadsheet(filename, delimiter='t', output_dir='.')¶

Basic class for reading CSV files and outputting QLC format.

Parameters :

filename : str

Path to the file to be loaded.

delimiter : str

The delimiter used in the CSV file. Default it tab.

output_dir : str

The output directory to write data to.

Notes

Here will be some notes.

Methods

get_matrix_full_rows() Create a 2D matrix from only the full rows in the spreadsheet.
pprint(matrix) Print the matrix in tab delimited format
print_matrix_stats() Convenience function to get some stats data about the spreadsheet
print_qlc_format() Print “simple” QLC format.
